{{TOC|right}}

A banner pattern [[Tag (Java Edition)|tag]] is a group of [[banner pattern]]s. Banner pattern tags are used to control how a banner pattern can be used inside a [[loom]].

== List of tags ==
=== no_item_required ===
Can be chosen in the loom without a banner pattern.
